metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000048 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: the web framework using ljharb's qs module older than v6.3.2, v6.2.3, v6.1.2, and v6.0.4 is vulnerable to a DoS. A malicious user can send a evil request to cause the web framework crash.

notes.Note: ebarretto> xenial, bionic and cosmic are not affected as their version does not support allowPrototypes options.

criterions.comment: node-qs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
